Title: Dawn in the motherland
Publisher: Shanghai renmin chubanshe (上海人民出版社)
Notes: Young people, many wearing Red Guard armbands, attend the flag raising ceremony on Tian'anmen Square and give a salute. The duvets and backpacks suggest they have travelled for this occasion.This poster was published in the late 1970s for export purposes, with captions in Chinese, English, French, and German.
